Delete a table

1 Click the Patient Summary button .

Or, on the Template menu, click Patient Summary.

2 Click the Real-Time tab or the Laboratory tab.

3 In the Table ID box, select the code or name for the table you want to delete.

4 Click Delete.

5 Click Close.
